description: Tor is a python based module for using tor proxy/network services on windows - osx - linux with just one click.

used for anonymous communication and web browsing. It is designed to protect users' privacy and freedom by preventing surveillance or traffic analysis. Abused by attacker for defense evasion, contacting C2 and data exfiltration
